name: GWDG ticket
text: GWDG ticket: This email is used for some fundamental troubles in the GWDG infrastructure.

name: Dr. Juergen Holm @ Theory in 2nd Physics Institute
text: An administrator of GoeGrid. He is responsible for batch system, some networks, a provisioning system and so on.

name: Dr. Tim Ehlers @ GWDG
text: He is responsible for hardware issues and is helping to keep RAID disks running in GoeGrid SE disk pools.

name: Dr. Gen Kawamura @ ATLAS in 2nd Physics Institute
text: A Grid expert. He is responsible for Grid middleware, services, the WLCG system and ATLAS production & analysis jobs. A developer of HappyFace and HappyFace Smartphone Application.
